# Test: Multiple tickets complete successfully in sequence
gitinit
cp kamaji.yaml kamaji.yaml
exec git add .
exec git commit -m 'init'

env KAMAJI_AGENT_SCRIPT='task_complete pass "Task done"'
exec kamaji start --spawner-cmd=mock-agent
stdout 'Sprint "test" complete'

exists .kamaji/history/TEST-1.yaml
exists .kamaji/history/TEST-2.yaml

-- kamaji.yaml --
name: test
base_branch: main
tickets:
  - name: TEST-1
    branch: feat/test-1
    tasks:
      - description: Task 1
  - name: TEST-2
    branch: feat/test-2
    tasks:
      - description: Task 2
